item.title: 【NLP Papers】ELMo: Deep contextualized word representations
item.author: ZubinGou
item.description: [Peters et al., NAACL 2018a] use bidirectional language model to train contextual word vector. use these vector as pre-train part of existing models, improve SOTA across six tasks. analysis showing that exposing the deep internals of the pre-trained network is crucial 1 Introduction pre-trained word representations should model both: complex characteristic of word use (e.g., syntax and semantics) how these uses vary across linguistic contexts (i.e., to model polysemy) ELMo: Embeddings from Language Models
